text: Namur (, ) is a municipality in Belgium. It is the capital of both Namur Province and of Wallonia, one of the three administrative regions of Belgium. It is in the French-speaking part of Belgium. In 2012, there were 112'246 people in Namur.Chiffre global de la population par commune - Situation au 1er mai 2011 (.pdf) Namur is at 50° 27 North, 04° 51 East. ==References==
title: Namur (city)
